keyFacts: The document lists key staff and managerial roles for entities LSJE and STC, which are part of Jeffrey Epstein's network.
STC is described as the administration office for LSJE, controlling purchasing, vendor payments, expense tracking, staff payroll, and contractor payments.
The presence of an attorney (Darren Indyke) and an estate manager (Mark Tollison) suggests legal and property management functions within the organization.
